songs.name: The Capital of Shinjuku
songs.wasPlayed: During the cart ride to the God's Throne.

songs.name: Chalky Woods
songs.wasPlayed: After the cart was wrecked and you walked up God's Throne.

songs.name: Hoise the Sword and Pride in the Heart
songs.wasPlayed: When the goblin escaped from the inn and ran into Isfre to be mercilessly killed.

songs.name: Requiem for the Gods
songs.wasPlayed: When a civilian found Paladin Thaanuff's white corpse in the snow at night. Isfre first suspected you of the deed.

songs.name: Septette for the Dead Princess / U.N. Owen was Her?
songs.wasPlayed: During Thaanuff's funeral - Last part was known was the Death Waltz they played for the dead at Ishomodae.

songs.name: Faith is for the Transient People
songs.wasPlayed: vs. Ranfelt in the abandoned clock tower located at Erri's old mansion where he was breeding gryphons.

songs.name: Extend Ash ～ Holy Mountain People
songs.wasPlayed: The battle versus Pharasma soldiers after warning Isfre about what Ranfelt told you about.

songs.name: Faith is for the Transient People.
songs.wasPlayed: The battle versus a Pharasma giant in the Pharasma army.

songs.name: Waterfall Woods
songs.wasPlayed: Ot Thundergaze has lost his Martha and Isfre has said she is not sending a rescue squad in to save her due to current circumstances.

songs.name: Clash on the Big Bridge
songs.wasPlayed: vs. Drunk Pharasma soldiers on the bridge between the main mountain and the city of Gormagas.

songs.name: City of Radiant Ruin
songs.wasPlayed: When the snow was melting as you wandered the old labyrinth surrounding Gormagas.

songs.name: On an Adventure Gliding Through the Skies
songs.wasPlayed: During the city of Gormagras while it is threatened by the evil creature Crolp.

songs.name: The Legend's Successor
songs.wasPlayed: During Phase 1 battle vs. Crolp.

songs.name: The Legend's Successor (Super Arrange)
songs.wasPlayed: During the final phase vs. Crolp.

songs.name: City of Radiant Ruin (Super Arrange)
songs.wasPlayed: In the city of Gormagras after destroying Crolp.

songs.name: U.N. Owen was Her? (Violin Ver.)
songs.wasPlayed: Battle in the cabin where Martha was dead, drained completely and Erri was found bound up by agents of Pharasma.

songs.name: Kyrie Eleison
songs.wasPlayed: As you woke up at the church after getting knocked unconcious by Isfre after saving Erri at the cabin.

songs.name: After School Spirits Club
songs.wasPlayed: Entering Dwarfus Meridianum's creepy halls.

songs.name: Den of the Dark Realm
songs.wasPlayed: Continuing through Dwarfus Meridianum...

songs.name: If - Over Drive
songs.wasPlayed: In the battle vs. Ug Thundergaze - Ot's son.

songs.name: On an Adventure Gliding Through the Skies (Super Arrange)
songs.wasPlayed: Doz is on the brink of death due to the poison in Dwarfus.

songs.name: North
songs.wasPlayed: Running around amid a forest of ice with the task of finding a unique flower.

songs.name: Ghostly Eyes [Ver.Eclipse]
songs.wasPlayed: vs. Paladin Lodel on the lizardman enchanter's blue transparent bridge back to Gormagras.

songs.name: Dark Road
songs.wasPlayed: Paladin Lodel is defeated and our heroes are on the way back to Gormagras, flower and water in hand.

songs.name: Dectet, Nonet, Octet
songs.wasPlayed: vs. Isfre in the church during Gormagras' attack on Ishomodae.

songs.name: Crimson Beyond a Fleeting Eternity
songs.wasPlayed: On the way to Erri's mansion after understanding you've destroyed Ishomodae's defenses and have opened pandora's box.

songs.name: The 4th movement of Flandre Suite
songs.wasPlayed: Vs. Erri.

songs.name: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind
songs.wasPlayed: The second track Vs. Erri.

songs.name: Screen
songs.wasPlayed: During Mercy's Embrace.

songs.name: Moonlight Shines
songs.wasPlayed: After Mercy's embrace, epilogue.
